textAfterTable: Bang for the buck In UTPA you get what you pay for. It is high quality education. However, there is financial aid which is very student friendly. I needed assistance in paying for my school, so I am familiar with the financial aid office. They answer all your questions and let you know the which is the better choice for you and why. They are extremely helpful. Am enjoying being here Not only because i am local. I meet people from all around the world from Venezuela to France. Everyone is always smiling. There is something for everyone. Edingburg is not a huge city but it has all the essentials and Mcallen is right next door. It is quiet so it is easy to sit and study outside on the benches in the shade or if you feel like releasing stress, pan am has a brand new recreation center equipped with treadmills, weights and a rock climbing wall. There is always activities from movies to live music. It is a great college experience. Am learning a lot All professors are approachable.
